main event: A civilian airline pilot reported a circular, slightly elongated dark object, about 5 inches in diameter, traveling at 240 mph at an altitude of approximately 2532 ft in White Plains, New York on 22 June 1953.
interesting points: The object was traveling at a speed of 240 mph.
It was described as circular, slightly elongated, and dark in color.
This was an air-to-air observation by a civilian airline pilot.
No physical evidence or photographs of the object were obtained.
